sqlMap.select: Select Code AS collectTypeCode , CodeName AS collectTypeName FROM $catalogName$.dbo.BA_Code WHERE Gubun = 'SUGU' ORDER BY Code
Select Code AS collectTypeCode , CodeName AS collectTypeName FROM $catalogName$.dbo.BA_Code WHERE Gubun = 'CUSU' ORDER BY Code
SELECT Code AS collectTypeCode , CodeName AS collectTypeName FROM $catalogName$.dbo.BA_Code WHERE Gubun = 'INGU'
